sentence.Network_en: Home ownership has been an overarching and innate desire of the British.
sentence.Network_cn: 拥有私宅是所有英国人心中压倒一切和根深蒂固的强烈愿望。

sentence.Network_en: Americans have an innate sense of fairness.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国人有一种天生的公平观。

sentence.Network_en: the innate conservatism of older people

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表A ... ness n. 海角 innate adj. 先天的, 天生的 adore v. 崇拜, 爱慕, (口语)喜爱.
《Friends》词汇表A ... ness n. 海角 innate adj. 先天的, 天生的 adore v. 崇拜, 爱慕, (口语)喜爱.
百度词典搜索_天 ... 天山[ Tianshan] 天生[ inborn;born;innate;inherent] 天师[ Taoist master].
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... inlet 湾,海口 innate 固有,生来的 inner 内部,内在的.

list.abs: 的反应,研究昆虫行为的科学称昆虫行为学(insect ethology), 一、 一、 昆虫的本能昆虫的本能本能又称先天行为(innate behavior),是由遗传因子决定的固有的行为.
inlying catheter 留置导管innate immunity 先天性免疫inner ear 内耳
哲学英语词汇?_百度知道 ... 目的论 teleology 先天观念 innate idea 同情 sympathy.
1.2 对“天赋观念”（innate ideas）的批判有人认为至少有些观念是天赋的，它们构成证明上帝存在的先决条件。 有人举例证明天赋观.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin innatus, past participle of innasci, from in- 'into' + nasci 'be born'

entry.def: An innate quality or ability is one which a person is born with.

example.ex: Americans have an innate sense of fairness.
example.tran: 美国人有一种天生的公平观。

example.ex: ...a society in which individuals could develop their innate abilities and capacities.
example.tran: 个人可以发挥其天生才干和能力的社会

means.word_mean: 1. not established by conditioning or learning;
3. present at birth but not necessarily hereditary; acquired during fetal development

auth_sentence.content: Some kind of logic is innate by animals also.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some kind of logic is innate by animals also.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some kind of logic is innate by animals also.

auth_sentence.content: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.

auth_sentence.content: Catroux's eye for design seems to be innate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Catroux's eye for design seems to be innate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Catroux's eye for design seems to be innate.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同词源的,同类的;同种的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cog同+nat出生的,本土的+e→同生的
in进+nat出生的,本土的+e→与出生一起进来→天赋的
nat出生的,本土的+al……的→adj.出生的
natal[adj.出生的]+ity表名词→n.出生率,出生
nat出生的,本土的+ion表名词→出生之处
nation民族,国家+ality表名词→n.国籍,民族
nat本土的+ive人→n.本地人,本国人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 自然界,大自然;性质,本性,天性
stems_affixes.word_buile: nat出生的,本土的+ure表名词→出生状态→天性
neo新+nat出生的,本土的+e→新出生

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或地位等"; 2. 表形容词,"具有……的"; 3. 表动词,"做,造成;使"

stems_affixes.word_buile: celib不结婚+ate人或地位等→n.独身者;adj.不结婚的;禁欲的
grade等级+uate=ate人或地位等→一级一级走完学业→毕业
col共同+legi读+ate具有……的→共同读书→学院的
consider考虑+ate具有……的→考虑到的
ef出现+femin女人+ate具有……的→出现女人状态
in进+ate具有……的→innate与出生一起进来→天赋的
in进入+veter老+ate具有……的→使成为老的

Sentence.sentence: of those she interviewed said that contact with their sisters and brothers increase innate adulthood.

means.word_mean: (品质、感情等)天生的, 先天的, 与生俱来的, 固有的

sentences.en: You obviously have an innate talent for music.
sentences.cn: 你显然有天生的音乐才能。

jushi.english: You obviously have an innate talent for music.
jushi.chinese: 你显然有天生的音乐才能。
